summary: Project to be updated to support mobile-app style installation and offline play via Progressive Web App (PWA) features.
architectural_notes: Implement PWA: web app manifest + service worker to enable install-to-home-screen and offline caching.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Square app icon illustration with a stylized jet/arcade motif (pwa-icon.dim_512x512.png)
- Maskable-style square icon with safe padding for Android adaptive icons (pwa-icon-maskable.dim_512x512.png)
- Small app icon variant (pwa-icon.dim_192x192.png)

existing_features.title: Add Progressive Web App metadata so the game is installable on Android (Add to Home Screen) and iOS (Add to Home Screen), launches full-screen, and has a proper app name/icon.
Implement a service worker that precaches the built frontend assets and enables offline play after the first successful load.
Register the service worker from a non-immutable frontend entry point (do not modify `frontend/src/main.tsx`) so that it runs for all users.
Add a small in-app install affordance (non-blocking) that helps users install the game to their home screen when the browser indicates it is installable.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add Progressive Web App (PWA) support for installable mobile app-like experience with offline play (manifest + service worker caching)

projectName: Add Progressive Web App (PWA) install + offline support for the mobile game
